Class Schema

    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Table>
          • org.mfg.mdb.compiler.Schema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Schema
extends java.util.ArrayList<Table>
implements org.mfg.mdb.compiler.internal.IJSON
    The schema of the database. Contains the table definitions and other information.
    Author:
    arian
    See Also:
